wikipedia_page.main: Henry Brian Farley (1 January 1927 – 1962) was an English professional footballer who played for Chelmsford City and Tottenham Hotspur.

response: * Brian Farley (1927 in Craven Arms – 1962) an English professional footballer who played for Chelmsford City and Tottenham Hotspur

On November 11, 2011, Eenhoorn was knighted on the order of Queen Beatrix, after he led the Dutch team to the 2011 Baseball World Cup title in his role as technical director. It was the first global baseball tournament won by the Netherlands. Also knighted were manager Brian Farley and catcher Sidney de Jong.Article by Marco Stoovelaar on the knightingBaseball America column by John Manuel
